original_text: Then Jesus went to eat a meal at Levi's house. Many people followed Jesus and they ate there with him and with his disciples. Many of these were bad people and also men who took taxes.
korean_text: 그의 집에 앉아 잡수실 때에 많은 세리와 죄인들이 예수와 그의 제자들과 함께 앉았으니 이는 그러한 사람들이 많이 있어서 예수를 따름이러라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus went to eat a meal at Levi's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 레위의 집에서 식사하러 가셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and they ate there with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그곳에서 예수님과 함께 식사했습니다

sentences.original_text: Many of these were bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 이들 중 많은 사람들은 나쁜 사람들이었습니다

sentences.original_text: and also men who took taxes
